p: The viral gene nucleotide sequences were spliced and corrected using SeqMan II software (DNA Star, Madison, WI, USA). The JEV gene sequences used for phylogenetic analyses were downloaded from GenBank ( S1 Table), and the ClustalW multiple sequence alignment was performed using BioEdit (Version 7.0, Hall 1999). Neighbor-joining phylogenetic trees were drawn using MEGA6.0 with 1000 bootstrap replicates [ 13, 21, 22].
